title: British Champion Pfeiffer Georgi Suffers Fractured Neck in Tour de France Femmes Crash
content:
Injury update from stage 5 crash: British champion off bike for next four weeks as battered and cut Pieterse also suffers consequences from pile-up.

Read the full article at British Champion Pfeiffer Georgi Suffers Fractured Neck in Tour de France Femmes Crash on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
